#summary The properties for the Application Server.

= server.properties=
<font size="3" face="Georgia, Arial">
# The default Application name
DEF_PATH=default

#The Server listening port number<br/>
PORT_NO=8080

#The Component Invoker listeneing port number<br/>
CMP_PORT=

#The Messaging Daemon listening port number<br/>
MESS_PORT=

#The Method Invoker listening port number<br/>
MI_PORT=

#Enable SSL?<br/>
SSL_ENAB=false

#The mime types supported<br/>
SUPP_MIMES=*

#Is Streaming supported?<br/>
STREAM_ENAB=false

#Is Authorization required<br/>
AUTH_ENAB=false

#Number of Server processes<br/>
NUM_PROC=4

#Is AJAX available?<br/>
AJAX_ENAB=true

#Are Controllers enabled?<br/>
CONT_ENAB=true

#Support Dynamic C++ Pages<br/>
DCP_ENAB=true

#Is Template Engine enabled?<br/>
TPE_ENAB=true

#Are Dynamic Views enabled?<br/>
DVIW_ENAB=true

#The type of Threading strategy<br/>
THRD_PREQ=true

#The Thread Pool size for Pooled implementations<br/>
THRD_POOL=false

#The type of Thread pool<br/>
THRD_PTYP=small|medium|large|vlarge

#The DB connection Pool Size<br/>
DB_CONN_POOL_SIZE=
</font>
